hjertekurvPage.changeColorLeft: Change color of the left heart
hjertekurvPage.changeColorRight: Change color of the right heart

paragraph.intro: Browse our complete collection of heart with patterns and images. Use search and filtering to find the perfect basket for your next project. You can filter by
paragraph.outro: to find a basket that suits your skills.

difficultyPopover.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyPopover.description: The difficulty level of a heart basket is determined by two factors:
difficultyPopover.weavingDetails: Evaluates how challenging the weaving process itself is, indicated by a heart icon:
difficultyPopover.weavingDetails2: This can include the number of strips, the thickness of the strips, and variation in the weaving pattern, all of which can make the process more complex.
difficultyPopover.cuttingDetails: Indicates how challenging it is to cut out the basket before weaving starts, and is marked with a scissor icon.
difficultyPopover.cuttingDetails2: Some baskets have detailed patterns that require precision and accuracy during cutting.

alphabetic.label: Alphabetical
alphabetic.description: Sort heart baskets in alphabetical order.

recentlyCreated.label: Recently Added
recentlyCreated.description: Show the newest heart baskets that were added.

lowestDifficultyFletting.label: Weaving - Easy
lowestDifficultyFletting.description: Filter by baskets with the lowest difficulty level for weaving.

highestDifficultyFletting.label: Weaving - Difficult
highestDifficultyFletting.description: Filter by baskets with the highest difficulty level for weaving.

lowestDifficultyKlipping.label: Cutting - Easy
lowestDifficultyKlipping.description: Filter by baskets with the lowest difficulty level for cutting.

highestDifficultyKlipping.label: Cutting - Difficult
highestDifficultyKlipping.description: Filter by baskets with the highest difficulty level for cutting.

popularity.label: Popularity
popularity.description: How popular the basket is (number of times the basket's page has been visited)
